concept.title: Orchestrate : Setting Up a Report for Conga Orchestrate

conbody.p: Conga Orchestrate provides key insights into processes on an individual level and on an org-wide basis. Use Conga Orchestrate to facilitate analysis and insights from native Salesforce Reports and Dashboards.
The Conga Orchestrate installed package ships a single dashboard and a handful of useful reports upon installation. Users can customize Conga Orchestrate's Dashboard and Reports as desired.

Navigate to the Dashboards tab and click Conga Orchestrate Dashboard. The Conga Orchestrate Dashboard functions as an insightful hub that details metrics related to past, current, and future processes. The Conga Orchestrate Dashboard includes the following reports by default:

ul.li: Current and Future Workload by Assignee

conbody.p: Click Edit to customize the dashboard and include additional reports from the Conga Orchestrate Reports folder.
Individual Conga Orchestrate Reports are located in the Conga Orchestrate Reports folder. These reports display key metrics and insight on the present, past, and future processes.
Presents report detail and report on current processes so that users have key insight on the day to day activity.

ul.li: All Business Processes not yet completed, organized by each Definition
The amount of open (not yet completed) steps assigned to users
A count of unique Business Processes initiated over a week
All process steps that are currently in a queued status
All process steps with checklist items in active processes
All process steps and active processes
A list of all Team Members currently in Default Teams
Processes with due dates prior to the current date that is still in "Open" status
All Opportunity records with related open and completed processes
All open process activities assigned to each user
All steps with a step type of Field Update
All steps with a status of "Error"
All steps that send an Email Alert
Contract records with related open and completed processes
Business Process records with related open and completed processes
A list of all process definitions in an org
All open steps assigned to each user
Accounts with assigned Team MembersPast Reports

conbody.p: Past reports allow users to analyze past processes to determine what processes worked and where improvements should be made.

ul.li: The average amount of time it takes users to complete a Business Process
The average amount of time each Process Definition takes to complete
A comparison of each Process Definition's projected completion time and the actual completion time
A comparison of the average amount of time taken for a user to complete a task and the average target task completion time
Calculates the average completion time for each user based on their completed tasks in the current and previous month
A comparison of each task's projected completion time and the actual completion time
All Web Service Callout Errors that have occurred

conbody.p: Future reports provide insight on future workload and allows users to determine and mitigatepotential roadblocks in the near future.

ul.li: The amount of steps assigned to users that are not yet created
Current and Future Workload by Assignee
The total amount of both open steps and steps not yet created that are assigned to each user
